phrases: Piccolo, the Warrior Who Came Late
Vegeta, are not you coming to help him?
Looks as though your legs are trembling, and you cannot move.
Well, you just wait there patiently a little while longer.
I am about to smother the breath of life from this one.
After which it will be your turn.
l- I do not care if the kid dies, I am just wondering what I am supposed to do.
I cannot wait until I have completely recovered from my injuries!
Gohan's Ki has all but disappeared!
You are the only one that ever freely associated with me.
Before I realized what had happened, you found your way into my heart,
and made yourself a place there large enough that I was unable to drive you out.
Is there nothing I can do?
If I do not act, I will be next!
He was supposed to have been at least critically wounded!
If you do not like it, come on over here!
How dare you make a fool of me!
There is no way I can stand against him.
I will just have to keep running away.
Somehow, I have got to keep him a little bit further away from Gohan.
I will take you apart with my own hands.
I do not know how it is you recovered,
but you dared to clip the tail of Freeza-sama, did not you?
I am going to knock you into so many pieces, you will never recover again!
No matter how you struggle, you will not escape my grasp.
Looks like you are about out of breath.
I will tear you to bits with my bare hands!
I will heal you right now!
Calling me out here for such a vain struggle...
S- So that is what is going on!
Why did you guys keep silent about the Namekian kid having that ability!?
We did not know about it either!
If we had known, we would have him heal Goku already!
It does not hurt at all any more!
True to the Saiyan blood that he carries, now that he is recovered, his battle power has increased greatly!
fate has somewhat turned to our favor.
With the three of us fighting now, something may turn out.
And he should have been on the brink of death!
You guys just do not know when you are beaten.
How many times have I told you that neither Earthlings or Saiyans are a match for me?
How can I possibly give up!?
Whether we have had it or not, there is nothing we can do but try!
We have been waiting for you, Piccolo-san!
So that is Freeza, is it?
He really is an incredible beast.
Well, if it is not the guy we slaughtered back on Earth.
So, I need not wonder what you wished for with the Dragonballs.
I see you brought this good-for-nothing scum back to life with them.
And I want you to remember something.
I want you to remember that after I put Freeza away, your turn comes next.
After you put Freeza away, you are coming for me?
I did not think you Namekians were capable of telling jokes.
No matter how much Piccolo may have gained from training at Kaio-sama's place,
Freeza's on a completely different dimension from the rest of us!
There is still a surviving Namekian, is there?
But there is something different about you from the other Namekians.
There seems to be something special about you.
And even so, you are still utterly no match for me.
I cannot tell whose Ki that is.
The Ki's too great to be Piccolo's.
Gohan's Ki has recovered as well.
I do not get anything that is going on!
Now, to clean up the dregs of the universe.
I will do this by myself.
You guys stay out of it.
That person they call Piccolo, he looks just like Nail-san!
You will get caught in our crossfire.
How does he know my name?
Not even Piccolo has a chance of winning against that guy!
He may have a glib tongue, but so long as he does not realize his opponent's battle power,
I would not count on him.
Who is it that just showed up with the enormous Ki?
Piccolo finally arrives at the scene of battle.
His challenge to Freeza may be thought of as reckless.
Does Piccolo indeed have a chance of winning?
